ygData.subject: RE: Runed Bone Fork (call for a spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I think somebody in Upper Guk drops it as a rare?  I was given a quick tour and we camped the Warden for an hour or so. (4 placeholder s in a row, ugh;
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I think somebody in Upper Guk drops it as a rare? I was given a quick
tour and we camped the Warden for an hour or so. (4 placeholder's in a row,
ugh; Squire and Scryer also 4 placeholders in a row - triple ugh!) My
enchanter friend also found the Froglok Witch Doctor, killed him and nada.
I vaguely remember being told "so & so" drops the ruined bone fork...

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Sibbald [mailto:ksibbald@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 9:39 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork (call for a
spoiler)

From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>

Don't know where it comes from (cause I want one
too) but the stats are +10
to MR, FR, and CR i believe. Disputed to be the best range
slot item that
you'd never want to throw.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
